response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is perfectly aligned with your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, it's worth $12,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $10,800. This represents a significant savings of 10% off its original value, making it an exceptional deal. I hope this offer will be favorable to you, and we look forward to welcoming you as a valued customer.", "product_price": 10800}
